release_note: What s new: Bug fixes and performance improvements In the last version: Fixed issue where new members wouldn t always load in the members screen New share button under each gratitude post Bug fixes and improvements As always feel free to send us feedback or questions to: hello gratitudeplusapp.com

Happy new year and thank you for being a part of our community! What s new: Improved design in the new entry screen Redesigned the action menu in the new entry screen Improved the keep writing feature which you see after tapping a mood Bug fixes and improvements

New: a quick way to keep writing! When you select your mood you ll be shown a curated list of additional prompts that you can quickly answer just by tapping it! Redesigned the edit date UI to make it easier to select yesterday s date Tap to scroll to next affirmation Bug fixes and improvements

We moved the streaks button to the top right of the home feed for quick access to your streak count. New streaks screen! We built a brand new screen showing your current streak as well as a calendar of your entries. Redesigned the memories card on top of the feed for a cleaner design. Bug fixes and improvements As always feel free to send us feedback or questions to: hello gratitudeplusapp.com

New design for journal prompts Friend or family in your circle not posting We ve added a quick nudge button on top to remind them! Bug fixes and improvements As always feel free to send us feedback or questions to: hello gratitudeplusapp.com
Improved design for attaching photos Bug fixes for location Various other bug fixes and design tweaks As always feel free to send us feedback or questions to hello gratitudeplusapp.com
Bug fixes for location not updating Bug fixes for memories getting cut off Various other bug fixes and design tweaks
New Insights tab for quick access to your streaks moods and more! iOS 17 support New share sheet with the ability to share directly to Instagram stories. Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements
See the gratitude prompt in circle posts Bigger button Bug fixes and improvements

Not too much in this update as we work on some bigger features for the next few versions! Minor design tweaks Bug fixes and improvements As always feel free to send us feedback or questions to: hello gratitudeplusapp.com
More prompts! Ability to restore your streak for 99 if you run out. Bug fixes and improvements As always feel free to send us feedback or questions to: hello gratitudeplusapp.com
Fixed issues with rotating prompts Fixed UI issues with icon sizing on devices with dynamic type enabled. UI improvements throughout app Bug fixes

Combined My Affirmations and Favorites affirmations section. Ability to get individual affirmations as daily notifications Fixes for daily quotes in affirmations Fixes for streak restores UI tweaks Bug fixes and improvements
New design for replying to gratitudes and messages. Fixed issue with text fields not being able to scroll. Design tweaks. Fixed a few small bugs.

New: see details about your circle by tapping the about button on top of the circle. New: Share a prompt to your circle! premium New: easily share the gratitude you just wrote to social media. Design tweaks. Fixed a few small bugs.

Brought back the red badge indicator for unread circle entries instead of the green circle shipped in the last release. We thought a green circle would be a better indicator but we were wrong on that one. Sorry! A few bugs were squashed in this release. We released a number of new features in the last few updates. You can always see the release notes in profile about! Thanks for using Gratitude Plus!

Fixed a bug with Instagram sharing. Sorry! Tweaked design for indicating new circle entries instead of a red badge it s a green circle like another well known app Bug fixes and tweaks. Released inthe last version: Tap a gratitude entry in circles or the explore feed to view more details like the prompt or location

Tap a gratitude entry in circles or the explore feed to view more details like the prompt! New affirmation reminders feature: get multiple reminders daily! Fixed crash when tapping inspiration button. Sorry. Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Redesigned insights with a new mood tracking design! Bug fixes and UI tweaks

Bug fixes and performance improvements In the last update: UI tweaks in the home screen. Ability to restore a broken streak! Premium feature Redesigned gratitude details view with more information on each entry.
UI tweaks in the home screen. Ability to restore a broken streak! Premium feature Redesigned gratitude details view with more information on each entry. Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Updated app design! Quickly see your streak info and stats with a new button above your journal entries. After tapping a mood you ll now see all of your moods from the week. UI Tweaks. Bug fixes.
Updated design of gratitude details screen. Fixed bug where gratitude entries could be cut off in details screen. New backup setting to show you data backup activity. UI Tweaks. Bug fixes.
Send a message to your circle! New ways to refer friends. Moved circle to the profile screen. Pull to refresh in circles. UI Tweaks Bug fixes
Send notifications when loving or clapping gratitudes! Redesigned share to screen. Bug fixes and UI Tweaks.
Thanks for using Gratitude Plus. What s new: Bug fixes and UI Tweaks

Thanks for using Gratitude Plus. What s new: Rotating prompts! Get a new prompt every day. To enable this tap the prompt on top in the entry screen. QR code in the invite screen. Read all button in messages screen to quickly mark all messages as read. Get a notification when someone saves an affirmation you shared. Bug fixes and UI Tweaks

Thanks for using Gratitude Plus! Here s what s new in this update: New! Share affirmations to circles! Highly requested we hope you like! UI improvements to affirmations. Fixed a variety of bugs and improvements. Some cool new features coming soon. Stay tuned. Note: this is the last version supporting iOS 13. Barely anyone is using that version so this shouldn t cause any problems but for us it s a lot of work to maintain! As always feel free to send us feedback or questions to hello gratitudeplusapp.com

As always feel free to send us feedback or questions to: hello gratitudeplusapp.com

Thanks for using Gratitude Plus! We re excited to share some great new features and enhancements in this update: Notes: Send positive anonymous notes to other Gratitude Plus users! To send a note tap the new note button next to each gratitude in the Explore tab. To view notes tap the new Notes tab. You ll only receive notes if you have anonymous gratitude sharing turned ON. Icon badging. When you get your daily reminder we ll also badge the icon. Tapping the gratitude prompt will now bring up the keyboard instead of bringing you to the screen to update your prompt. Sorry to anyone who was confused by this. UI tweaks Various Bug fixes and performance improvements. We love and appreciate your feedback. Please send us any questions or feedback to: feedback gratitudeplusapp.com Thanks! The Gratitude Plus Team
